repos.name: AutomaticFaceBlur

repos.description: Computer vision project that counts the number of boxes passing on a conveyor belt.

repos.name: DevHub
repos.description: DevHub is a community where developers share their ideas and also meet other developers.

repos.name: EyeBlinkCounter
repos.description: This computer vision project counts how many times the eye has been blinked.

repos.description: Captures faces from a video feed. Good for generating datasets for training machine learning models

repos.description: News app made with flutter

repos.name: GazeTracking

repos.name: grammarlyExpressApi
repos.description: This api uses the unofficial grammarly api and express which has been configured as an api to correct text and return result as json

repos.name: HitTheBallGame
repos.description: This simple computer vision game show cases the power of opencv and mediapipe and the cvzone helper module. In this game the user is expected to push the ball as many times as he can before the time runs out.

repos.name: Hugging-Face-Transformers-Summarization
repos.description: A super fast walkthrough of NLP Text Summarization with Hugging Face Transformers.

repos.description: This is a small gamebot to play the karate kiddo telegram game. Uses real time image analysis.

repos.name: midasmlpy
repos.description: Python implementation of the midasml approach

repos.name: MiniPhotoEditor
repos.description: Mini editing software which utilizes common opencv functions to edit images. Both GUI was also made with openCV

repos.name: PassGuide
repos.description: Use this android app to secure your passwords for different websites. Made with kivy and kivymd for android . You can customize the project if you want

repos.name: PythonQuizApp
repos.description: A quiz app made with python

repos.name: RealCryptoData
repos.description: This is a one page website made with flask which uses the coinlore api to get information about cryptocurrencies like their prices.

repos.name: Remote-form-refill
repos.description: A small api that can be used to request a remote user to help fill out a form for another user and after submission , the form owner's fields will be updated in with what the remote user has entered.

repos.name: RemoteFiles
repos.description: EasyPeezy-Remote file sharing project. Its just a project i built for myself to help me share files easily when both my pc and mobile phone are connected to one network

repos.name: Speech-Bot
repos.description: Speech to text chatbot that uses the assembly ai api and chatbot api to communicate in real time with a user.

repos.description: Telegram invoice bot to generate business invoices

repos.name: TitleContent
repos.description: This project utilizes hugging face's solution for title creation from text

repos.name: TypingSpeedTest
repos.description: This is a typing speed test desktop application created with the kivy and kivymd libraries.

repos.name: VideoLiveStream
repos.description: Get Real time video from your browser or from any connected device, you can customize this project by adding your custom host if you want to see the result on multiple devices. This project grabs the frame from the device's camera then send it using flask , which can be viewed from the browser

repos.name: Virtual-Calculator
repos.description: This simple math calculator showcases the power of computer vision whereby the player uses his hand to press the keys instead of manually pressing or clicking anything.

repos.name: VirtualMouse
repos.description: Control the cursor of your pc by directly placing your hands in front of the camera and performing a few gestures

repos.name: weather_app
repos.description: This project illustrates the use of an api and the kivy and kivymd libraries to create an app that gives weather information  about a given city
